#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;
#define CLR(a,val) memset(a, val, sizeof(a))
#define SZ(V) (LL)V.size()
#define ALL(V) V.begin(),V.end()
#define RALL(V) V.rbegin(),V.rend()
#define FORN(i, n) for(LL i = 0; i < n; i++)
#define FORAB(i, a, b) for(LL i = a; i <= b; i++)
#define MOD 1000000007LL
#define PB push_back
#define MP make_pair
#define F first
#define S second

typedef long long LL;
typedef pair<LL,LL> pll;


LL dp[100];
int main()
{
	LL test;
	cin >> test;
	while(test--){
		string s;
		cin >> s;
		set<char> st;
		CLR(dp,-1);
		map<char,int> mp;
		mp[s[0]]=2;
		LL ct=1;
		FORN(i,SZ(s)){
			st.insert(s[i]);
			if(!mp[s[i]]){
				if(ct==2) ct++;
				mp[s[i]]=ct++;
			}
		}
		LL p=1,b=SZ(st),ans=0;
		if(b==1) b=2;
		FORN(i,SZ(s)){
			ans += (mp[s[SZ(s)-i-1]]-1)*p;
			p*=b;
		}
		cout << ans << endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
